name: Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd (V.S.E)
address: Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd (V.S.E), 3807 Marine Dr, Burnaby, BC V5J 3E3

featured_reviews.review_id: Recently, Tarum and Vancouver Solar completed our solar installation, which was a major component for our new home to gain a national, Net Zero certification.  Tarum made it easy for us and performed admirably.  We are delighted on a job well done!
featured_reviews.review_text: Recently, Tarum and Vancouver Solar completed our solar installation, which was a major component for our new home to gain a national, Net Zero certification.  Tarum made it easy for us and performed admirably.  We are delighted on a job well done!

featured_reviews.review_id: Tarum & his team were hired to install what was supposed to be a pretty straight forward 190+ solar panel installation.  The hicup was the delay of the new roof installation on the facility.  As a result Tarum had to work closely with the roofing contractor to make sure his installation met the warranty requirements.  I have to say that Vancouver Solar did an exceptional job of doing quality work despite the obstacles.  Tarum took care of all permits & dealing with BC Hydro to join its grid.  He made sure that the job was done right.  We are pleased with the finished product & would highly recommend Vancouver Solar.
featured_reviews.review_text: Tarum & his team were hired to install what was supposed to be a pretty straight forward 190+ solar panel installation.  The hicup was the delay of the new roof installation on the facility.  As a result Tarum had to work closely with the roofing contractor to make sure his installation met the warranty requirements. featured_reviews.review_id:
Vancouver Solar was the best out of three quotes. I compared not only price per watt, but type of system and warranty. Our roof has many segments and some skylights, which added complexity, but the installation was done well and looks very clean. There are no visible wires on the roof although the system has 9 separate panel locations. Tarum the owner made the whole process easy including the permit application and the setup for net metering with hydro. He was happy to give me detailed explanations on the types of solar, we went with optimizers and an inverter, and answered many questions of mine. We're now 2 months in and the system is working really well. We've had no issues and the app is easy to use. I'm so happy to see our credits at BC Hydro building up this summer for when we need it in the winter.
In the end I cannot recommend Vancouver Solar enough. Great job guys!

featured_reviews.review_id: My wife & I researched the system, received quotes from 5 different contractors. Tarum made a big difference with his proposal, he performed an aerial site survey and thoroughly explained his design from the electrical service connection down to placement of each solar panel.All permitting completed, Engineer's sign-off, coordination with BC Hydro for our net-metering application, all taken care of and the installation completed promptly with a clean site each day. I would highly recommend Tarum & his team at Vancouver Solar & Electrical.
featured_reviews.review_text: My wife & I researched the system, received quotes from 5 different contractors. Tarum made a big difference with his proposal, he performed an aerial site survey and thoroughly explained his design from the electrical service connection down to placement of each solar panel.All permitting completed, Engineer's sign-off, coordination with BC Hydro for our net-metering application, all taken care of and the installation completed promptly with a clean site each day. I would highly recommend Tarum & his team at Vancouver Solar & Electrical.

featured_reviews.review_id: We researched and compared solar companies for about 6 months. I had spreadsheets cost comparing cost of installation with panels against the impact of the system. My husband researched panels and system set up. We were utterly careful, cautious and very deliberate and probably a little annoying to work with. Tarum was EXCEPTIONAL - and so thoughtful, patient and willing to share. He was flexible with system set up, thoughtful about our needs and utterly reliable. He was super careful with our roof, and handled all the paperwork with the city. I would absolutely recommend him! Exceptional experience and we're THRILLED with our system!! It was affordable, designed well and brilliantly completed. I also waited for a windstorm before posting my review - just to be certain!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Megan, thanks ever so much for leaving such kind words. We're so glad that you're happy with your new solar array and we'll be keeping our eye on it on our remote monitoring software for years to come. All the best to you and Mick, you were such pleasant customers to work with. Tarum

featured_reviews.review_id: We purchased 2 commercial systems from VSE, one in the city and one in a rural location in the interior of BC.  Tarum and his crew were fantastic from start to finish, great recommendations, very good value, fantastic attention to detail on the installation.  We are going to use them again for a 3rd system and would recommend them to anyone!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Installation was on time and on budget !
Our last bill was negative -$82 including all our electric Car charging. We would definitely recommend Tarum and his Vancouver Solar Team
featured_reviews.review_text:
Installation was on time and on budget !
Our last bill was negative -$82 including all our electric Car charging. We would definitely recommend Tarum and his Vancouver Solar Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
We were building a new home and wanted to go all solar. We contacted some other companies, but Tarum was the most professional in explaining our options and had competitive pricing.
Tarum took care of all the ordering, permits and schedules, and worked with our builder for the installation.  He also contacted BC-Hydro to setup the net-metering account. It was a hassle-free and smooth process.

As we were the first solar in our area, Tarum had to spend a day tutoring to the electrical inspectors how the solar system worked.

We now have 44 solar panels installed on our roofs along with a battery backup system and it has been working great.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Michael, thanks ever so much for your kind words and for being a great customer to work with.

I'll be keeping an eye on your Solaredge EV charger inverter monitoring system for the solar array and built-in Tesla EV charger, aswell as your 3x Tesla Powerwalls with whole-home backup.

Enjoy hour energy Freedom as the grid is now your backup!
